original_text: When the Jews saw the crowds, they were filled with jealousy. They began to contradict what Paul was saying and heaped abuse on him.
korean_text: 유대인들이 그 무리를 보고 시기가 가득하여 바울이 말한 것을 반박하고 비방하거늘

sentences.original_text: When the Jews saw the crowds
They began to contradict what Paul was saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바울이 말하는 것을 반박하기 시작했다
